text: @SpeakerPelosi @SpeakerPelosi please just stop he screwed up so he lost his job @POTUS  has that right. You do not run the whole government also stop putting your liberal wish list in to the bill for COVID19.  THANK YOU, WE THE PEOPLE OF THE UNITED STATES
